column1: Attaching/Detaching and Platform Sharing is authorised as shown below -

When shunt moves are taking place at Edenbridge, services should not be timed to depart Godstone until 14minutes after the train in front has departed Edenbridge Platform 2. This allows enough time for the ground frameto be cleared and back in the normal position.
Refer to Kent Timetable Planning Rules – SO130
